text: Elections were held in 2008 for the Mayor and ward representatives of the Dehradun Municipal Corporation, the local government body for the city of Dehradun in Uttarakhand, India. Vinod Chamoli of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) was elected mayor. The BJP won 28 of the 60 seats, and the Congress won 24. ==Mayoral election== ==Position of the house== {|class="sortable wikitable" |+| Dehradun Municipal Corporation |- ! colspan="2" |Party!! Won !! +/− |- | Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) || 28 || - |- | Indian National Congress (INC) || 24 || - |- | Bahujan Samaj Party (BSP) || 1 || - |- | Uttarakhand Kranti Dal (UKD) || 1 || - |- | Independents || 6 || - |- | colspan="2" |Total|| 60 ||±0 |- |} ==See also== *2008 Uttarakhand local body elections ==External links== * Official Website of the Dehradun Municipal Corporation Category:Dehradun Municipal Corporation
title: 2008 Dehradun Municipal Corporation election
